item.description:
Sorry for the very late news about this. I'm in the pit orchestra and wanted to advertise this show happening this week! (Also, I say this counts as World Music material because the music and story are heavily Spanish/gypsy-themed. :) )

I can't serve as an event organizer because I'm participating, so unless someone else is interested in organizing, this is not an official event.

WHAT: Bizet's "Carmen" - fully-staged opera production
WHO: MetroWest Opera (and volunteer orchestra)
WHERE: Weston Town Hall
SHOWTIMES: Thurs-Sat, May 16-18, 8:00pm / Sun, May 19, 3:00pm

TICKETS: $20 students/seniors, $25 general (plus processing fees) - http://www.brownpapertickets.com/event/344961

More info: http://metrowestopera.org
item.name: FYI: Bizet's "Carmen" by the MetroWest Opera (four shows, NOT just Friday!)
